text: Splinter is the mentor figure for the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. He is a rat who raised the four turtles. ==Portrayals== Splinter has been played by Kevin Clash, Mako Iwamatsu, and Tony Shalhoub in movies based on TMNT.
